title: Death By Vampire
description: For Lirian Nimah, her job was more than just a job with perks that would allow her to occasionally slake her thirst for blood – it was an opportunity to slake her thirst for justice. Being an operative for the Colonial Intelligence Agency – a special department of the Terran government – provided favorable opportunities for her to satisfy her vampyric needs without too many questions being asked. This time the job looked promising – hostages. A hostage taker. Ransom. Greed. Blood diamonds – and blood.
author: Christina Engela
